about_the_game:
GAMEPLAY & FEATURES

  • Indie fantasy J-RPG totaling approx. 5 hours of gameplay

  • Meet captivating heroines, each with their own distinct charm

  • Explore nostalgic maps with Japanese gods, girls, and Yokai 

  • Engage in battles to defeat Yokai and restore peace to the town!

  • Use rare cards to deliver devastating damage to your enemies!

- Battle and Conquer the Yokai

Engage in epic battles to defeat troublesome Yokai and restore peace to the town!

- Collectible Yokai Cards

Relive the nostalgia of classic card games as you collect a wide array of Yokai cards! Store them in your collection and unleash unique abilities during battles. Use rare cards to deliver devastating damage to your enemies!

- Diverse Female Characters

Meet a vibrant cast of characters, including a police officer, a caring mom, a shrine maiden, and more! Each brings their own charm to the game.

- Choose Your Playstyle

Want a quick playthrough? Just follow the Heart Marks! Prefer a deeper experience? Seek out all the Exclamation Marks to enjoy side stories and extra content.

- System Requirements

This game was developed using RPG Maker MV. Please ensure your system meets RPG Maker MV’s requirements for optimal performance.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains suggestive themes, mild violence, and crude language. No nudity is depicted, though some character designs may include revealing outfits and/or exaggerated physical features.

name: Yokai Busters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Conteúdo sexual
Linguagem imprópria
Violência fantasiosa

short_description: Yokai Busters is an indie fantasy J-RPG featuring a diverse cast of female characters. You'll find a police officer, a caring mom, a shrine maiden, and more! Explore the maps and have a blast battling with your favorite Japanese girls, and Yokai!
